name: DrugInfoSkill
0:
”Alexa, open drug info”
”Alexa, ask drug info what is the generic”
”Alexa, ask drug info what are the side effects”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drug info
Developer Terms of Use
des: This app will return information about a drug after it is given a drug name. It can tell you the generic, side-effects, treatments, etc.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
